vote.title: To amend A0175-2024 Reappointment of Bernita Reese, M.S., CPRP, Director, Columbus Recreation and Parks, 1111 E. Broad Street, Columbus, Ohio 43205, to serve on the Confluence Community Authority Board of Trustees, to include the phrase “in her official capacity”, with a term expiration date of September 16, 2026 (résumé attached).
vote.description:
Title
 
To amend A0175-2024 Reappointment of Bernita Reese, M.S., CPRP, Director, Columbus Recreation and Parks, 1111 E. Broad Street, Columbus, Ohio 43205, to serve on the Confluence Community Authority Board of Trustees, to include the phrase “in her official capacity”, with a term expiration date of September 16, 2026 (résumé attached).
